This file provides the partition of the COVID-19 patients used in our submitted paper "COVID-19 Detection Fusing Breathing and Coughing Information" for consideration to appear in the Proceedings of the 43rd Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society (EMBC). The original data is introduced in [1], which contains breathing, coughing and speech samples recorded using both a web-based app and an Android app. We split the data into train, validation and test partitions. We define below the patient IDs, which are available from the file names of the recordings, that have been used to populate each partition. In brackets we report the total number of patients per partition, set-up, and COVID-19 test result.

[1] Chloe Brown, Jagmohan Chauhan, Andreas Grammenos, Jing Han, Apinan Hasthanasombat, Dimitris Spathis, Tong Xia, Pietro Cicuta, and Cecilia Mascolo, “Exploring automatic diagnosis of COVID-19 from crowdsourced respiratory sound data,” in Proceedings of the ACM SIGKDD International Conference on Knowledge Discovery & DataMining, Virtaul Event, CA, USA, 2020, pp. 3474–3484.


Train

	Web-based APP (8)
